mapper.insert: insert into cosumer (cosumer_id, cosumer_address, cosumer_condition, cosumer_headpicture, cosumer_name, cosumer_password, cosumer_phonenumber, cosumer_points, cosumer_sex, cosumer_zipcode, mai_address) values (#{cosumerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cosumerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cosumerCondition,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{cosumerHeadpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cosumerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cosumerPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cosumerPhonenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cosumerPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cosumerSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{cosumerZipcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maiAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cosumer set cosumer_address = #{cosumerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cosumer_condition = #{cosumerCondition,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cosumer_headpicture = #{cosumerHeadpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cosumer_name = #{cosumerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cosumer_password = #{cosumerPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cosumer_phonenumber = #{cosumerPhonenumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cosumer_points = #{cosumerPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cosumer_sex = #{cosumerSex,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cosumer_zipcode = #{cosumerZipcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mai_address = #{maiAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cosumer_id = #{cosumerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cosumer_id, cosumer_address, cosumer_condition, cosumer_headpicture, cosumer_name, cosumer_password, cosumer_phonenumber, cosumer_points, cosumer_sex, cosumer_zipcode, mai_address from cosumer where cosumer_id = #{cosumerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
